[DQR.IFRS.0105.9556] The following elements are in the presentation linkbase of 02 - Voittoa tai tappiota osoittava laskelma but are not included in any calculation relationship in the filing. ifrs-full:OtherComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTaxExchangeDifferencesOnTranslation, ifrs-full:OtherComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTaxGainsLossesOnRemeasurementsOfDefinedBenefitPlans, ifrs-full:ProfitLossFromDiscontinuedOperations, almamedia:ContinuingOperations, almamedia:DiscontinuedOperations, ifrs-full:ComprehensiveIncomeAttributableToOwnersOfParent, ifrs-full:ProfitLoss, ifrs-full:ComprehensiveIncome, ifrs-full:ProfitLossAttributableToNoncontrollingInterests, ifrs-full:ComprehensiveIncomeAttributableToNoncontrollingInterests, ifrs-full:OtherComprehensiveIncome All elements appearing in the face of the financial statements should be included in a calculation relationship somewhere in the filing.
This rule will produce an error irrespective of a fact value being entered for the item(s) listed above.
Rule Element Id:9556 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 -

[DQR.IFRS.0105.9556] The following elements are in the presentation linkbase of 03 - Tase but are not included in any calculation relationship in the filing. ifrs-full:AssetsOfBenefitPlan, ifrs-full:Liabilities, ifrs-full:EquityAndLiabilities All elements appearing in the face of the financial statements should be included in a calculation relationship somewhere in the filing.
This rule will produce an error irrespective of a fact value being entered for the item(s) listed above.
Rule Element Id:9556 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 -

[DQR.IFRS.0126.9595] The statement 04 - Rahavirtalaskelma includes an inconsistent calculation. The value of the concept ifrs-full:CashFlowsFromUsedInInvestingActivities of -28,400,000 should be equal to the sum of its child components defined in the calculation linkbase. The sum of these child components is -28,700,000. The values of the addends is determined by adding the values of the child concepts with a decimal value of -5. All values in the financial statements should use the same decimal value. The values reported in the financial statement in the current reporting period of 2020-01-01 to 2020-12-31 should be complete if the financial statement is to be mathematically accurate and complete. The components of ifrs-full:CashFlowsFromUsedInInvestingActivities that should add to -28,400,000 are comprised of the following:
+ ProceedsFromSaleOfTangibleAndIntangibleAssets 0 + CashFlowsFromLosingControlOfSubsidiariesOrOtherBusinessesClassifiedAsInvestingActivities 51,100,000 - CashFlowsUsedInObtainingControlOfSubsidiariesOrOtherBusinessesClassifiedAsInvestingActivities 72,500,000 + ProceedsFromOtherLongtermAssetsClassifiedAsInvestingActivities 0 + ProceedsFromSalesOfInterestsInAssociates 400,000 - PurchaseOfIntangibleAssetsClassifiedAsInvestingActivities 2,200,000 - PurchaseOfInterestsInAssociates 4,000,000 - PurchaseOfOtherLongtermAssetsClassifiedAsInvestingActivities 600,000 - PurchaseOfPropertyPlantAndEquipmentClassifiedAsInvestingActivities 900,000
The addends are calculated based on the calculation linkbase defined for 04 - Rahavirtalaskelma. If addends are missing then the calculation tree should be amended. The rule will not add dimension components as the financial statement does not include a table. If dimensions are used on the statement then add a table to ensure that the dimensions are defined correctly.
Total Element : ifrs-full:CashFlowsFromUsedInInvestingActivities Total Value : -28,400,000 Total period : 2020-01-01 to 2020-12-31 Dimensions : Decimals : -5 Rule Element Id:9595 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 - https://filings.xbrl.org/743700ILU1PL86IW3429/2021-12-31/ESEF/FI/0/almamedia-2021-12-31-fi.zip/almamedia-2021-12-31-fi/reports/almamedia-2021-12-31-fi.xhtml 13051
